title: Final isa marks
content:
I thought final isa marks meant isa1+isa2+ assignments/project etc 
But the final isa marks which we got are out of 40 can someone please explain?
Also only for math the assignment marks were included for the rest it's just isa1+isa2/2

comments.body: They will release the assignment marks separately after which it should be out of 50

Your both ISA marks are together scaled down to 30M and assignments/projects are scaled to 20M
Together it makes 50M. Remaining 50M is scaled down from ESA which decides your grade
Umm but we were told assignments were for 10 m is that wrong?
Will it be in the same place isa results were announced?

That is correct, depending on number of assignments each will be scaled to around 7 marks and including your project it will be evaluated to 20M which will be added along with scaled down ISA marks to give your final ISA
